name: Tabletop Roleplaying Game AI Assistant
description: A computational support tool for game masters of tabletop roleplaying games

name: Warmer
description: A browser-based game about climate change and human impacts on the environment. An NSF-funded project @ the University of California, Santa Cruz.

name: Spatial Cognition in Virtual Reality
description: Studies on the effects of teleporting in virtual reality on spatial cognition

name: Co-Located Virtual Reality / Physical Escape Room
description: An escape room that explores asymmetric puzzle-solving in physical and virtual spaces

name: Terasology: Light and Shadow
description: A capture-the-flag game mode made for open-source voxel game Terasology, funded by Google Summer of Code.

name: Fusion Galaxy
description: A mobile game about collecting and crafting elements together to discover the universe, funded by the Massachusetts Digital Games Institute.

name: Red Survivor
description: A survival strategy PC game, where you gather resources to survive against killer robots in a war-torn Russia. Made with a team at Mustachio Games. Shown at Boston Festival of Indie Games, 2014.

name: The Abyss and The Ark
description: Authored and co-authored several interactive fiction games, including The Abyss--a surreal exploration of the mind--and The Ark--a puzzle game set aboard a derelict spaceship.

name: sub-Q Magazine
description: Co-ran online magazine for interactive fiction by reviewing submissions, editing pieces, and interviewing authors.

name: On Equal Terms
description: Developed interactive digital exhibit about the experiences of tradeswomen with the Women's Studies Research Center at Brandeis University.

name: Films and animation
description: Created short films and animations as part of the CET study abroad program in Prague and the Getz Media Lab at Brandeis University.
